content:
I am a football fan and I am interest to know some information about the Man United club. Can you provide me with some profile information about the club?
Begin!

I will start by looking up the precise ID for Manchester United, using the short information function of clubs within different domains.

After retrieving the ID, I will proceed to obtain detailed information such as the club’s profile, city, stadium, etc., by making a relevant API call using the Manchester United Club ID.

First task is to find the club ID of Manchester United.

name: clubs_get_short_info_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'clubs': [{'id': '985', 'name': 'Man Utd', 'fullName': 'Manchester United', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/wappen/medium/985.png?lm=1457975903', 'nationalTeam': '', 'flag': None, 'marketValue': None, 'mainCompetition': {'id': 'GB1', 'name': 'Premier League', 'shortName': 'Premier League', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/logo/normal/gb1.png?lm=1521104656', 'leagueLevel': None, 'isTournament': None}}]}"}

I successfully obtained the club ID for Manchester United, which is '985'. To get a richer set of informations, domain looks accurate since response is sane showing the relevant club profile including the Premier League where the team competes.

Next, it's straightforward to use this ID to fetch more detail-rich data about the club. I will request the full profile of Manchester United.

name: clubs_get_profile_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'internationalTeamFlag': '', 'mainFacts': {'id': '985', 'fullName': 'Manchester United Football Club', 'street': 'Sir Matt Busby Way', 'postalCode': 'M16 0RA', 'city': 'Manchester', 'phone': '+44 1616767770', 'fax': '', 'homepage': 'www.manutd.com', 'founding': 'Apr 24, 1902', 'members': '0', 'membersDate': '-', 'countryName': 'England', 'countryID': '189', 'countryImage': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/verysmall/189.png?lm=1520611569', 'avgAge': '26.73', 'squadSize': '27', 'legionaries': '19', 'internationalRank': '', 'nationalPlayer': 19}, 'stadium': {'id': '78', 'name': 'Old Trafford', 'street': 'Sir Matt Busby Way, Old Trafford', 'postalCode': 'M16 ORA', 'city': 'Manchester', 'phoneTicketCenter': '+44 870 757 1968', 'faxTicketCenter': '', 'homepage': '', 'ticketCenter': '', 'constructionYear': '1910', 'totalCapacity': '74879', 'standingRoom': '0', 'seats': '74879', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/foto/stadionnormal/manchester-united-old-trafford-2021-...

- **Street**: Sir Matt Busby Way

- **Construction Year**: 1910
